title: Creating for Sydney League Tournament (SLT)

embed.description: o The team with the most towers killed o The team with the most kills o The team with the most gold earned from the topmost gold earner. If that is tied, compare the two next highest gold earners from each team.

body:
Greetings,

I will be creating a team for the Under Division event (Bronze 5 to Gold 1).
The event starts on the 6th of December 2017 and runs until the 31st of January 2018.

Group stage will require players from all teams to endure seven consecutive weeks of battling it out online,
until the end of that period when only 4 teams, the teams with the highest gross point, will remain.
Teams will then be required to play the finals matches in a LAN environment at the following venues.

Legends Cyber Cafe
Address: 505 George St, Sydney NSW 2000

FBI Gaming
Address: 1 Dixon St, Sydney NSW 2000

Contacts are
League ign : Doobay Slayer

Looking forward to hear back from you
